UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Vejovine, a new antibiotic from the scorpion venom of Vaejovis mexicanus.
Literature.Author: Hernández-Aponte CA, Silva-Sanchez J, Quintero-Hernández V, Rodríguez-Romero A, Balderas C, Possani LD, Gurrola GB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4.4µM),Escherichia coli 170(MIC=4.4µM),Escherichia coli 5580(MIC=10µM),Escherichia coli 9240(MIC=20µM),Enterobacter cloacae 2524(MIC=4.4µM),Enterobacter cloacae 6266(MIC=>20µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 913(MIC=17.7µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1262(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4677(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 5106(MIC=17.7µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 6102(MIC=100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 7804(MIC=20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 7847(MIC=5µM)
